flavorText: "I will soar higher than the walls of Akros! Higher than the clouds! Higher than Heliod himself!"

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich werde höher fliegen als die Wände von Akros! Höher als die Wolken! Höher als Heliod selbst!"
foreignData.name: Ungestümer Sonnenjäger
foreignData.text:
Fliegend, Eile
Der Ungestüme Sonnenjäger greift in jedem Zug an, falls möglich.

foreignData.flavorText: "¡Volaré por encima de las murallas de Akros! ¡Por encima de las nubes! ¡Por encima del propio Heliod!".
foreignData.name: Cazador solar impetuoso
foreignData.text:
Vuela, prisa.
El Cazador solar impetuoso ataca cada turno si puede.

foreignData.flavorText: « Je m'élèverai au-dessus des murs d'Akros ! Au-dessus des nuages ! Au-dessus d'Héliode lui-même ! »
foreignData.name: Chassesoleil impétueux
foreignData.text:
Vol, célérité
Le Chassesoleil impétueux attaque à chaque tour si possible.

foreignData.flavorText: "Mi librerò più in alto delle mura di Akros! Più in alto delle nubi! Più in alto di Eliod stesso!"
foreignData.name: Cacciasole Impulsivo
foreignData.text:
Volare, rapidità
Il Cacciasole Impulsivo attacca ogni turno, se può farlo.

foreignData.flavorText: 「アクロスの城壁より高く昇って見せよう！そして雲よりも高く！いずれヘリオッド様さえも超えてみせるさ！」
foreignData.name: 性急な太陽追い
foreignData.text:
飛行、速攻
性急な太陽追いは可能なら毎ターン攻撃する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: "나는 아크로스의 성벽보다 높이 솟아오르리라! 구름보다 높이! 헬리아드보다도 높이!"
foreignData.name: 성질 급한 태양추종자
foreignData.text:
비행, 신속
성질 급한 태양추종자는 가능하면 매 턴마다 공격한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu vou voar mais alto que as muralhas de Ácros! Mais alto que as nuvens! Mais alto que o próprio Heliode!"
foreignData.name: Perseguidor do Sol Impetuoso
foreignData.text:
Voar, ímpeto
Perseguidor do Sol Impetuoso ataca a cada turno se estiver apto.

foreignData.flavorText: «Я взлечу выше стен Акроса! Выше облаков! Выше самого Гелиода!»
foreignData.name: Страстно Стремящийся к Солнцу
foreignData.text:
Полет, Ускорение
Страстно Стремящийся к Солнцу атакует в каждом ходу, если может.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我会飞得比阿喀洛斯城墙还高！直上云霄！超越赫利欧德！」
foreignData.name: 急切逐日者
foreignData.text:
飞行，敏捷
急切逐日者每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我會飛得比阿喀洛斯城牆還高！直上雲霄！超越赫利歐德！」
foreignData.name: 急切逐日者
foreignData.text:
飛行，敏捷
急切逐日者每回合若能攻擊，則必須攻擊。

name: Impetuous Sunchaser
originalText:
Flying, haste
Impetuous Sunchaser attacks each turn if able.

rulings.text: Impetuous Sunchaser attacks only if it’s able to do so as the declare attackers step begins. If, at that time, it’s tapped or affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having it attack, you’re not forced to pay that cost. If that cost isn’t paid, Impetuous Sunchaser won’t attack.
You choose which player or planeswalker Impetuous Sunchaser attacks.

text:
Flying, haste
Impetuous Sunchaser attacks each combat if able.
